name: Komikku Preview r9576
body:
#### What's Changed
##### New
- Filter only Obsolete sources in Migration screen (@cuong-tran)
- Add option to always use SSIV for image decoding (@AntsyLich)

##### Improve
- Trying to load saved-search as much as possible even though filterList might changed (@cuong-tran)
- Improve saved-search usage (@cuong-tran)
- Allow reset filters on SourceFeedScreen (@cuong-tran)
- Allow using saved-search while migration source search (@cuong-tran)
- Change bulk-favorite icon to Heart (@cuong-tran)
- Bump default user agent (@AntsyLich)
- Support comma (,) delimiter when searching library (@cuong-tran)
- Auto format extension repo URLs (@AntsyLich)
- Some improvements to Bangumi tracker search (@MajorTanya)
- Do not sync automatically when not connected to a network. (@NGB-Was-Taken)

##### Fix
- Fix a rare crash when invoking "Mark previous as read" action (@AntsyLich)
- Fix long strip images not loading in some old devices (@AntsyLich)
- Fix InterceptActivity crash (@jobobby04)
- Fix crashes from Exh Updater (@jobobby04)
- Fix app onStart sync (@jobobby04)
- Fix crash on MigrationListScreen with null accessing a mutableState when it's being put in the background (@cuong-tran)
- Fix Reader's dialog font size (@cuong-tran)
- Fix multiple issues with the E-Hentai updater (@jobobby04)
- Fix a possible crash with auto-zoom (@jobobby04)
- Fix source-search clear causing disappearance of search box (@cuong-tran)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/r9523...r9576

---

### Checksums

| Variant | SHA-256 |
| ------- | ------- |
| Universal | d4810c40e54cfb0834dc1253b83c502ba0307a89114b9842f1a01f270d854979 |
| arm64-v8a | 329720d8616359ee311c8bb4f1b151d8318e4afbf996c7d9202c01778ae99128 |
| armeabi-v7a | cd500e73fd8397b07994a3d4de2028af35d2cc91c1c054ce55ad0321347498ca |
| x86 | cc45fb1109cc08127d084fd780cba15d1d011aae6fae31a05690bc0a3ae027e4 |
| x86_64 | a2da81a678d626e0a80b2fe393f987f8059e3924d67f6e1a6e145972e7373e04 |

### If you are unsure which apk to download then go with `Komikku-r9576.apk`

name: Komikku Preview r9512
body:
### What's Changed
#### New
- Error screen (#462) (@cuong-tran)
- Range-selection for Migration (#466) (@cuong-tran)

#### Improve
- Loading screen for Upcomping/Updating screen (@cuong-tran)
- allow chapter 0 dupe auto mark as read (jobobby04/tachiyomiSY#1291) (@Riztard)
- rework panorama cover settings (@cuong-tran)
- update all trackers based on common data when new tracker is added (@cuong-tran)
- show a toast whenever progress is synced from Trackers (@cuong-tran)
- Always/Ask/Nerver update trackers on mark as read (mihonapp/mihon#1374) (@Animeboynz)
- Avoid blocking call to load categories in settings (@cuong-tran)
- Update translation

#### Fix
- Fix for ExHentai (@az4521, @jobobby04)
- Fix sync progress from tracker not working if chapters' order is messed up after backup restoration (@cuong-tran)
- Fix app crash when removing tracked entry from tracker (@cuong-tran)
- Fix settings SliderItem steps count (mihonapp/mihon#1356) (@abdurisaq)
- Cleanup Slider usage (@AntsyLich)
- fix title for Checking update screen to "To be updated" (@cuong-tran)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/r9484...r9512

name: Komikku Preview r9484
body:
## What's Changed
### New
* show all entries going to be checked for Smart update on Upcoming screen (@Cuong-Tran)
* allow Feed to hide entries already in Library (@Cuong-Tran)
* Added random library sort (@jackhamilton)
* Add option to opt out of Crashlytics (@Animeboynz)

### Improve
* show duplicating manga cover on Duplicate dialog (@Cuong-Tran)
* always enable panorama cover for Feed & Global search (@Cuong-Tran)
* Add Quantity Badge to Upcoming Screen (@Animeboynz)
* make global search pinned/all sticky (@Cuong-Tran)
* hide Pinned chip in Global/Migrate Search if no pinned sources available (@Cuong-Tran)
* Allow adding multiple tags separated by commas (@NGB-Was-Taken)
* show loading indicator while bulk-selection is running (@Cuong-Tran)
* bulk-selection: reverse selection (@Cuong-Tran)
* auto select saved-search tab if opened from another screen (@Cuong-Tran)
* Reload saved-searches when screen is navigated back to (@Cuong-Tran)
* hide Filter save-button on SourceFeedScreen (@Cuong-Tran)
* only load suggestions after entry finished loading info & chapters (@Cuong-Tran)
* Hide sync library option when sync is disabled (@FuSan21)
* Show download state and progress on reader chapter list. (@NGB-Was-Taken)
* Confirmation dialog when removing privately installed extensions (@Animeboynz)

### Fix
* Revert to automatically sync marked read chapters to trackers (@Cuong-Tran)
* fix: late loading saved-searches when jump from SourceFeedScreen or FeedScreen (@Cuong-Tran)
* fix color when using custom theme with AndroidView on DownloadQueue & MigrationBottomSheetDialog (@Cuong-Tran)
* fix source search box's height (@Cuong-Tran)
* Fix issue with not showing source names in merged manga sometimes (@Jobobby04)
* Fix EnhancedTracker not auto binding when adding manga to library (@brewkunz)
* Retain remote last chapter read if it's higher than the local one for EnhancedTracker (@brewkunz)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/r9404...r9484

---

### Checksums

| Variant | SHA-256 |
| ------- | ------- |
| Universal | 78de9cbcb255cb56881e4f3af9bd2436e41c57df00f52c4bfee7a2a0ac9bb8eb |
| arm64-v8a | 6001ef5a34e855e74cf07ae8ed5cd83c72d4344863e0518345d62489c0468f8e |
| armeabi-v7a | b2033fc8467ea14a6b39c9d10f18ef13fb0c8578d54e814fb6f87ac8eac01860 |
| x86 | 9459abc0ccedeb041b490dff507610777eefad363582961626e73dd49523c74d |
| x86_64 | d4d25f7dde48823d1d38336b07c3bf10d64eedf383ce4c369b91e29a359b9370 |

name: Komikku Preview r9378
body:
## What's Changed
### New
- feat: Hidden categories (@cuong-tran)
- feat: feed reorder screen & support sources' saved-searches (@cuong-tran)
- ui: show number of entries on upcoming screen (@cuong-tran)
- feat(ui): saved search tabs for browse source (@cuong-tran)
- disable smart-update for individual & fix custom interval (@kana-shii)
- Option to update trackers when chapter marked as read (@animeboynz)

### Improve
- e-hentai language flag (@cuong-tran)
- Support skip-downloading-duplicate-read-chapters for merged entries (@shabnix)
- Show local chapters as downloaded on merged entries. (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Re-enable fetching chapters list for entries with licensed status (@animeboynz)
- Move "Choose what to sync" out of "Sync now" (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Respect `thumbnailQuality` and `tryUsingFirstVolumeCover` preferences. (MD) (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Reduce ChapterNavigator horizontal padding on small ui (@AntsyLich)
- hide display mode for e-hentai (@cuong-tran)
- Ignore "intent://" urls on webview (@bapeey)
- Remove legacy broken source and history backup (@AntsyLich)

### Fix
- Fix Kitsu `ratingTwenty` being typed as String (@MajorTanya)
- Fix Kitsu `synopsis` nullability (@MajorTanya)
- fix: wrong feed adding when filter search (@cuong-tran)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/r9318...r9378

name: Komikku Preview r9312
body:
## What's Changed
### New
- Showing source icon in library (@cuong-tran)
- Use language flags (@cuong-tran)
- Bulk-merging multiple library entries (@cuong-tran)
- Ability to enable/disable repo (@cuong-tran)
- Show repo icon for Repo (@cuong-tran)
- Custom themes (@kana-shii)
- Allow sync Feeds & extension-repo settings (@cuong-tran)
- Add `show entry` action to download notifications (@mm12)
- Add option to skip downloading duplicate read chapters (@shabnix)
- Delete duplicate downloaded chapters when they are automatically marked as read (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Remove the `UNOFFICIAL` status, remove built-in Komikku repo, instead allow adding it as default (@cuong-tran)

### Improve
- Show same extension from multiple repos & show their repo's name (@cuong-tran)
- Rename Related Titles to *Suggestions* (@cuong-tran)
- Add more auto backup hours (@kana-shii)
- Add option to update library each 6 hours (@kana-shii)
- Back-button on pre-migration source (@cuong-tran)
- Don't expand description on the manga while merging (@cuong-tran)
- Hide keyboard when a Tracker SearchResultItem is clicked (@Animeboynz)
- Move dropdown menu to correct position (@cuong-tran)
- Add extensions list refresh menu (@cuong-tran)
- Add confirmation when adding repo via URI (@Animeboynz)
- Respect privacy settings in extension update notification (@Animeboynz)
- Option to not backup Saved searches & Feeds (@cuong-tran)
- Change Reader's open-in-browser icon to Explore (@cuong-tran)

### Fix
- Smart library updates now will honor the 'Skip Completed' option (@kana-shii)
- Setting to hide home button while browsing *Suggestions* (@cuong-tran)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/r9234...r9312

---

name: Komikku Preview r9234
body:
## What's Changed
### New
- feat(migration): add option to only show entries with new chapters (@timschneeb)
- feat: add source search to pre-migration screen (@cuong-tran)
- Add Copy Tracker URL on icon long press (@mm12)
- Add a button to select all scanlators (@AntsyLich)
- Add an `open in browser` button to reader menu (@mm12)
- Add Backup and Restore of Extension Repos (@Animeboynz)

### Improve
- feat: allow canceling search for a migrating manga without remove it (@cuong-tran)
- ui: put *Suggestions* in overflow (@cuong-tran)

### Fix
- Update Kitsu's domain to kitsu.app (@cuong-tran)
- Settings to show/hide progress-banner were not working (@cuong-tran)
- Fix MAL search results not showing start dates (@MajorTanya)
- Wrong initial number of migrating items (@cuong-tran)
- Don't crash on ill-formed URLs (@FooIbar)
- Handle Android SDK 35 API collision (@AntsyLich)

name: Komikku Preview r9115
body:
## What's Changed
### New
- feat(ui): Add restoring & syncing banner (@cuong-tran)
- feat: Add support for backing up and restoring global popular/latest feeds (@cuong-tran)
- feat: Add support for backing up and storing source's feeds along with saved searches (@cuong-tran)
- feat: search entry's title in library (@cuong-tran)

### Improve
- chore: improve google drive sync. (@kaiserbh)
- Make global search "Has result" sticky (@AntsyLich)
- Added configuration options to e-ink page flashes (@sirlag)
- feat: Add back navigation to clear source search query (@cuong-tran)
- improve: don't show arrow if *Suggestions* are from Recommends (@cuong-tran)
- Smart Update Dialog Tweak (@Animeboynz)
- Update LewdMangaChecker (@gelionexists)
- Observe tracker login state instead of fetching once (@AntsyLich)
- Update dependencies: moko-resources, lifecycle, firebase, sqlcipher, material-motion-compose, google-api-drive

### Fix
- Correct tako variable colours (@CrepeTF)
- Fix some MDLang issues (@jobobby04)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/r9078...r9115

name: Komikku Preview r8998
body:
### New
- New app icon, thanks @sshJovian & @NeKoOuO (@cuong-tran)
- Make the app Android 8+ (@AntsyLich)
- Add NSFW filter & source search into Merge screen (Find in another source) (@cuong-tran)
- Option to not show *Suggestions* by default but use a button to open that screen (@cuong-tran)

### Improve
- Improve Theme cover based performance & color; support Pure-dark-mode (#81) (@cuong-tran)
- Hide *Suggestions* if not found any result (@cuong-tran)
- Default to put ShowRecommendation in the overflow menu (@cuong-tran)
- Remove some legacy folder/file name lookup for download (@AntsyLich)
- Translation update & more, thanks @NeKoOuO

- Revert "Bump compose version" which causes laggy with scroll (@cuong-tran)
- Bangumi tracker for Komikku, thanks @NeKoOuO (@cuong-tran)
- Fix sources' NSFW filter was being reverted (@cuong-tran)
- Fix chapter's date wrong color randomly (MangaChapterListItem: Don't use alpha modifier) (@AntsyLich)
- Check category order before restoring from backup (@AntsyLich)
- Fix chapter number parsing when number is after unwanted tag (@AntsyLich)

name: Komikku Preview r8923
body:
### New:
- A dedicated screen for *Suggestions*, fetching directly from sources (@cuong-tran)
- "What's New" & "Preview peeking" directly from Github's release notes (@cuong-tran)

### Improve:
- More & faster *Suggestions* (@cuong-tran)
- Fix fetching *Suggestions* from extensions was not concurrently (@cuong-tran)

### Others changes
- Update dependencies and cleanup
- Update compose bom and fix renovate config for it (#674) (@FooIbar)
- Use m3 ripple and clean up interactionSource usage (#675) (@FooIbar)
- Use Okio instead of `java.io` for image processing (#691) (@FooIbar)
- Add MyAnimeList issue autoclose (#703) (@MajorTanya)
- Use Coil pipeline instead of SSIV for image decode (#692) (@FooIbar)
- Log app crash exceptions in dumped crash logs (#742) (@FooIbar)
- Fix some extension related issue and cleanups (@AntsyLich)
- Trust extension by repo (#570) (@AntsyLich)
- Address firebase ktx module deprecation (@AntsyLich)
- Massively improve findFile performance (#728) (@raxod502)
- Fix Local Manga details edit (@jobobby04)
- Include lewd filter in filter highlight (@jobobby04)
- Add getImageUrl override to EHentai (@jobobby04)
- Get new page url on image fetch failure for EHentai (@jobobby04)
- [RU] Translations (#1161) (@Dexroneum)
- Downgrade crashlytics plugin (@jobobby04)
- Change keyboard type in extension repo dialog (#764) (@xbjfk)
- Possibly fix extension obsolete bug (@jobobby04)
- Fix search bar style (@AntsyLich)
- Fix tap control area shifting after zooming out (#767) (@FooIbar)
- Use new SurfaceContainer color roles (@AntsyLich)
- update r8 rules for `MultipartBody.Builder` in extensions (#783) (@AwkwardPeak7)
- Update themes to follow new compose update changes (#766) (@CrepeTF)
- Fix MigratorTest after update io.mockk to v1.13.11 (@cuong-tran)

https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/28fb304229...dec4410072

---

### Checksums

| Variant | SHA-256 |
| ------- | ------- |
| Universal | c59922a57deb3c611fcc6795fb16324cee72ba997a4ad400707cb1c2ff95f3a6 |

name: Komikku Preview r8851
body:
### Changes

- Show *Suggestions* for all sources
- Bulk selection multiple entries to favorite/category
- Search for source in Browse screen
- Quick NSFW sources filter in both Extensions/Browse screen
- Feeds screen support all sources
- More Feed's entries
- Click manga's source name will jump to source browsing
- Show extensions/sources NSFW & languages tag
- Jump to extensions' settings from Source screen
- Built-in official extensions repo
- Migrate to Komikku's own Tracking clients
- Configurable interval to refresh entries from downloaded storage
- Updater switched to method similar to Mihon's
- Revert back support to show extensions' changelog & readme
- Based on TachiyomiSY stable 1.10.5(Mar 2,2024)
- Based on Mihon stable 0.16.4(from 0.16.3)
- Minor fix for mark duplicate chapters as read
- Include the delayed tracker update fix

### Commits

https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/8c651a1d0...23d862d17
